column4: please can someone help me to get libboost1.47 in the ubunu repositories?
i added maverick repository, but its not listed in there :(
yes, but where do find the repository where the 1.46.1 is in ?
when i do apt-cache search... i only get lists of 1.40.0 versions
W: Unable to locate package libboost-serialization1.46.1
i did :( bbut i only have 1.40 in there
i guess i am missing some repositories
in /etc/apt/source.list
btw i am using 10.04 LTS
then you might have to seek out a backport or PPA to get that version
the link ActionParsnip sent was for 11.10
libboost is not in lucid backports, FYI: http://packages.ubuntu.com/lucid-backports/libs/
good
PPAs are personal package archives - it's up to volunteer individuals to maintain those
they're mostly fine, but just pay attention to what you're adding ;-)
you might also experiment with installing the deb for a newer version from packages.ubuntu.com - 'dpkg --dry-run <packagename>' would be your friend
but realize that you're on your own if you do so - that would not be supported :-/
try 'apt-cache showpkg <packagename>'
'sudo apt-get --install-suggests <package>'
sorry - I'm wrong
it's 'sudo apt-get --install-suggests install <package>'
missed the 'install' part ;-)
